name: Mixer Minor Improvements
description: Changes a few things that bothered me with mixers design. If you have any suggestiions on things to add or change just start a new discussion on this style and I'll add/change whatever it is if I think it's a good idea!
additional_info:
Version 1: 

   * The follow/unfollow button are changed to look better.

   * Follower count has a "followers" text before it instead of a small heart after it.

   * The color of the live viewers counter is now red.

   * The color of the text in the header area is in a darker color.
